Au nom de Dieu, clément et miséricordieux ! In the name fo [G]od, the Compassionate, the Merciful. In the name of God, etc.
De la part de ʿĪsā b. Abī ʿAṭāʾ. Au maître de poste d'Ašmūn. From ʿIsā b. Abī ʿAṭā to the postmaster of Ushmūn. From ʿĪsā bn Abī ʿAṭ[ā t]o the postmaster of Ashmūn.
Donne à Muslim, mon messager, Give my messenger Muslim Mount my messenger Muslim
deux montures de la poste, dont l'une on two posthorses, one of them two post mounts, one of them
a furāniḳ's horse. And it was written by Mohamed in the month est celle du courier. Muḥammad a écrit au mois the post guide’s mount. Written by Muḥammad in the month
de rabīʿ II l'année of Rabīʿ II, in the year one hundred and twenty-seven. Rabīʿ ii, year twenty-seven and
a hundred. cent vingt-sept.
De la part de ʿĪsā b. Abī ʿAṭāʾ. Au [maītre] de poste d'Ašmūn. From ʿIsā b. Abī ʿAṭā to the post[master] oft Ushmūn. From ʿĪsā bn Abī ʿAṭā [to the post]master of Ashmūn.
